titleStmt.title: New news, and strange news from Babylon or the coppy of a letter which was sent from the Master of Malta, to a gentleman and kinsman of his resident here in England, wherein is related the birth of a very strange prophet, with his manner of living, actions, and great wonders performed by him : also his departure from thence, threatning with terrour and feare the countries desolation.
titleStmt.author: Master of Malta.

titleStmt.title: New news, and strange news from Babylon or the coppy of a letter which was sent from the Master of Malta, to a gentleman and kinsman of his resident here in England, wherein is related the birth of a very strange prophet, with his manner of living, actions, and great wonders performed by him : also his departure from thence, threatning with terrour and feare the countries desolation.
titleStmt.author: Master of Malta.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
